overview: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall. (credit: IMDB)  This takes the epic “zed word” classic and extends it to its maximum possible running time.  To create the longest possible cut closest to Romero’s shooting script. (Credit: Fanedit.org)
original_title: Dawn of the Dead: Extended Mall Hours Cut
title: Dawn of the Dead: Extended Mall Hours Cut
